In a message dated 6/10/03 11:59:25 AM Central Daylight Time, 
Proudwing500k@... writes:


> Feeling this was getting too intimate, AzureBlade broke the spark
> contact and came out of his trance.
> 
> AzureBlade: Forgive me. I haven't explained everything. I am known as
> Protoform Z, but my name is AzureBlade. I can feel things through my
> spark, things like other sparks. I felt you were wounded, so I came to
> offer my help. If you do not wish it, I will go. As for him... (He
> pointed at Scourge) I have never seen him and I do not know him.

She only stood there, watching Azureblade.

> 
> He rose from the ground and walked toward Scourge.

Her crimson optics followed Azureblade....

> 
> AzureBlade: Easy now! Relax and try to focus on your internal repairs.
> You're wounded too. (Turning to Maxima) Would this happen to be some
> kind of haven for the injured?

This started her pondering as well. "Indeed. These waters have an energy to 
them to revitalize & repair." She turned to the 2, her old personality was 
starting to show through now from teh innocent confusion she had before. "For 
this, neither of you should speak of this place. If you cannot keep it a secret, 
then you shall remain here or be terminated." Her crimson optics glared at them 
both. "Do I make myself clear?" 

The powers of the waters was showing with her form repairing itself, double 
the speed as with the normal repair system. It was like the CR Chambers but 
slightly better. 

Standing there before them, the waterfall behind her, her form shimmering 
from the energy water & the sun, her crimson optics glowing at the 2 male bots. 

--part1_141.135d86ca.2c1772bb_boundary
